```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
eskisehir <- data.frame(
  district   = c("Odunpazari", "Tepebasi", "Sivrihisar", "Cifteler", "Seyitgazi"),
  population = c(426581, 394734, 20258, 14814,12878))

```
```{r}
install.packages('ggplot2')
library(ggplot2)
```
. Please draw a boxplot to visualize the population of districts (20 pts).
```{r}
ggplot(eskisehir,aes(x=district,y=population,fill=district))+
  geom_bar(stat="identity")
```
